original_title: Quit before maximum force is used! – Tiran Alles warns drug dealers and organized criminals
original_body_lines: COLOLMBO (News 1st) –  Minister of Public Security Tiras Alles says that special operations will be launched from drawn Sunday (17) to combat organized crimes in Sri Lanka.
Minister Tiran Alles issued a strong warning to the drug dealers and organized criminals to quit their operations immediately.
He said that failing to do so will end up in maximum force used against them.
